message: I am little confuse in scenario with plugins. We have Asp.Net hosted in IIS and Service running as windows service with controllers (SOA). This service is plugin inside our Asp.Net application and all requests are redirected to windows service's controllers(using proxy). Is is safe to use Task.Run inside hosted windows service application? Does This hosted windows service application use another threadpool? So in this scenario there are 2 threadpools, first for Asp.Net app and second for Windows service app? Does it mean that i am not stealing threads from Asp.Net application thread pool if I use Task.Run? Thanks
